sch:pattern.name: AbstractRules

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB313] Invalid UBLExtension/ID when UBLExtension/ExtensionAgencyID is equal to 'Digitaliseringsstyrelsen'. ID must be an assigned value between '1001' and '1999'.

sch:assert.test: cbc:ProfileID/@schemeID = $Profile1_schemeID or cbc:ProfileID/@schemeID = $Profile2_schemeID or cbc:ProfileID/@schemeID = $Profile3_schemeID or cbc:ProfileID/@schemeID = $Profile4_schemeID or cbc:ProfileID/@schemeID = $Profile5_schemeID or cbc:ProfileID/@schemeID = $Profile6_schemeID

sch:rule.sch:assert: [W-LIB003] Invalid schemeID. Must be '' or '' or '' or '' or '' or ''
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB004] Invalid ProfileID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB302] Invalid ProfileID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB308] Invalid ProfileID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB325] Invalid ProfileID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB327] Invalid ProfileID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB351] Invalid ProfileID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB328] The profile '' is not allowed in the document type ''
[F-LIB352] The profile '' is not allowed in the document type ''

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB006] Invalid . Must be of this form '6E09886B-DC6E-439F-82D1-7CCAC7F4E3B1'

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB296] Invalid listID. Must be ''
[F-LIB297] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be ''
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB298] Invalid CurrencyCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB301] Invalid Country/IdentificationCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB007] Attribute unitCode must be used for
sch:rule.sch:assert: [W-LIB008] The value of unitCode attribute should be a valid UOM measure
[F-LIB318] Invalid unitCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist.

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-LIB011] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one element is present
[W-LIB012] Multilanguage error. Replicated elements with same languageID attribute value
[W-LIB222] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one Description element is present
[W-LIB223] Multilanguage error. Replicated Description elements with same languageID '' attribute value
[W-LIB222] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one Description element is present

Error.Description: [W-LIB223] Multilanguage error. Replicated Description elements with same languageID attribute value ''

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB013] Invalid . Must not be negative or zero
[F-LIB374] Invalid . Must not be negative or zero, unless it has been converted from PEPPOL BIS3
[F-LIB375] Invalid . Must not be negative, unless it has been converted from PEPPOL BIS3
[F-LIB019] Invalid . Must not be negative or zero
[F-LIB376] Invalid . Must not be negative or zero, unless it has been converted from PEPPOL BIS3

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB014] Invalid . Must have 2 decimals
[F-LIB021] Use either AccountingCost or AccountingCostCode
[F-LIB022] PartyName/Name is mandatory if PartyIdentification/ID is not found
[W-LIB219] The attribute Name@languageID should be used when more than one PartyName class is present
[W-LIB220] Multilanguage error. Replicated PartyName classes with same Name@languageID attribute value
[F-LIB221] If ID not specified, Address is mandatory

sch:report.test: (not(cbc:ID) or cbc:ID = '') and (not(cbc:Name) or cbc:Name = '') and (not(cbc:Telephone) or cbc:Telephone = '') and (not(cbc:Telefax) or cbc:Telefax = '') and (not(cbc:ElectronicMail) or cbc:ElectronicMail = '') and (not(cbc:Note) or cbc:Note = '') and not(cac:OtherCommunication)

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB235] At least one field in the Contact class should be specified
[F-LIB236] Use either ChannelCode or Channel
[F-LIB237] When Contact/OtherCommunication is used, the element Contact/OtherCommunication/Value must be filled out.
[F-LIB024] There must be a FirstName if the FamilyName is not present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB025] Invalid AddressFormatCode. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB204] Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:addresstypecode-1.1'
[F-LIB205] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '320'
[F-LIB206] Invalid AddressTypeCode. Must be a value from the codelist
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB026] Invalid listID. Must be either 'urn:oioubl:codelist:addressformatcode-1.1' or 'UN/ECE 3477'
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB207] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '320'

sch:report.test: cbc:AddressFormatCode/@listID = 'urn:oioubl:codelist:addressformatcode-1.1' and not(normalize-space(cbc:AddressFormatCode) = 'StructuredDK' or normalize-space(cbc:AddressFormatCode) = 'StructuredLax' or normalize-space(cbc:AddressFormatCode) = 'StructuredID' or normalize-space(cbc:AddressFormatCode) = 'StructuredRegion' or normalize-space(cbc:AddressFormatCode) = 'Unstructured')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB027] Invalid AddressFormatCode. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB208] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '6'

sch:report.test: cbc:AddressFormatCode/@listID = 'UN/ECE 3477' and not(cbc:AddressFormatCode = '1' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '2' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '3' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '4' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '5' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '6' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '7' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '8' or cbc:AddressFormatCode = '9')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB209] Invalid AddressFormatCode. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB213] When Country is used, the element Country/IdentificationCode must be filled out
[F-LIB028] When ID is used under Address the attribute schemeID is used to give an addressregister
[F-LIB029] schemeID attribute must be present on an address ID

sch:report.test: (cbc:AddressFormatCode = 'Unstructured') and (count(cbc:StreetName) != 0 or count(cbc:BuildingNumber) != 0 or count(cbc:CityName) != 0 or count(cbc:PostalZone) != 0 or count(cac:Country) != 0)

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB031] An Unstructured address is only allowed to have AddressLine elements
[F-LIB032] AddressLine elements not allowed for a StructuredDK address type
[F-LIB033] PostalZone is mandatory for a StructuredDK address type

sch:report.test: (cbc:AddressFormatCode = 'StructuredDK') and ((not(cbc:StreetName) or normalize-space(cbc:StreetName) = '') and (not(cbc:Postbox) or normalize-space(cbc:Postbox) = ''))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB034] There should be either a StreetName or a Postbox for a StructuredDK address type

sch:report.test: (cbc:AddressFormatCode = 'StructuredDK') and ((not(cbc:BuildingNumber) or normalize-space(cbc:BuildingNumber) = '') and (not(cbc:Postbox) or normalize-space(cbc:Postbox) = ''))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB035] There should be either a BuildingNumber or a Postbox for a StructuredDK address type
[F-LIB036] AddressLine elements not allowed for a StructuredLax address type
[F-LIB037] ID is required for a StructuredID address type

sch:report.test: (cbc:AddressFormatCode = 'StructuredID') and (count(cbc:StreetName) != 0 or count(cbc:BuildingNumber) != 0 or count(cbc:CityName) != 0 or count(cbc:PostalZone) != 0 or count(cac:Country) != 0)

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB038] Only the ID is used for a StructuredID address type

sch:report.test: (cbc:AddressFormatCode = 'StructuredRegion') and ((not(cac:Country/cbc:IdentificationCode) or cac:Country/cbc:IdentificationCode = '') and (not(cbc:Region) or cbc:Region = '') and (not(cbc:District) or cbc:District = ''))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB039] Region or District or Country/IdentificationCode is required for a StructuredRegion address type

sch:report.test: (cbc:AddressFormatCode = 'StructuredRegion') and (count(cbc:StreetName) != 0 or count(cbc:BuildingNumber) != 0 or count(cbc:CityName) != 0 or count(cbc:PostalZone) != 0)

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB040] Only Region, District, and/or Country/IdentificationCode can be used for a StructuredRegion address type
[F-LIB067] TaxTypeCode is not allowed when TaxScheme/ID equals '63' (Moms)
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB065] Invalid TaxScheme/ID. Must contain a value.
[F-LIB066] Invalid Name. Must contain a value

sch:report.test: not((cbc:ID = '63' or cbc:ID = 'VAT')) and not(contains($TaxType2, concat(',',cbc:TaxTypeCode,',')))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB197] TaxTypeCode must be a value from the '' codelist when TaxScheme/ID is different from '63' or 'VAT' (Moms)

sch:assert.test: cbc:ID/@schemeID = $TaxScheme_schemeID or cbc:ID/@schemeID = $TaxScheme2_schemeID or cbc:ID/@schemeID = $TaxScheme4_schemeID or cbc:ID/@schemeID = $TaxScheme5_schemeID

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB070] Invalid schemeID. Must be either '', '', '' or ''
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB071] Invalid listID. Must be either '' or ''
[F-LIB198] Name must equal 'Moms' when TaxScheme/ID equals '63' (Moms)
[F-LIB199] Name must correspond to the value of TaxScheme/ID
[F-LIB337] Invalid Country/IdentificationCode: ''. Must be a value from the country codelist
[F-LIB233] The AddressFormatCode under JurisdictionRegionAddress must always equal 'StructuredRegion'

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB074] Invalid TaxCategory/ID. Must contain a value.
[F-LIB075] Invalid schemeID. Must be either '', '' or ''.

sch:report.test: ((cbc:ID/@schemeID = $TaxCategory1_schemeID) and not (contains($TaxCategory1, concat(',',cbc:ID,',')))) or ((cbc:ID/@schemeID = $TaxCategory2_schemeID) and not (contains($TaxCategory2, concat(',',cbc:ID,',')))) or ((cbc:ID/@schemeID = $TaxCategory3_schemeID) and not (contains($TaxCategory3, concat(',',cbc:ID,','))))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB309] Invalid ID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[W-LIB230] Name should only be used within NES profiles
[F-LIB231] Use either PerUnitAmount or Percent
[F-LIB232] When PerUnitAmount is used, BaseUnitMeasure is mandatory
[F-LIB382] When 'TaxCategor\ID' = '', 'TaxCategory\Percent' can not be ''
[F-LIB078] There must be a StartDate if you have a StartTime
[F-LIB079] There must be a EndDate if you have a EndTime

sch:report.test: (cbc:StartDate and cbc:EndDate) and not(number(translate(cbc:EndDate,'-','')) > number(translate(cbc:StartDate,'-','')) or number(translate(cbc:EndDate,'-','')) = number(translate(cbc:StartDate,'-','')))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB080] The EndDate must be greater or equal to the startdate

sch:report.test: (cbc:StartTime and cbc:EndTime) and not(number(translate(cbc:EndTime,':','')) > number(translate(cbc:StartTime,':','')) or number(translate(cbc:EndTime,':','')) = number(translate(cbc:StartTime,':','')))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB081] EndTime must be greater or equal to StartTime
[F-LIB238] Invalid TaxExchangeRate/ForeignExchangeRate/ID. Must contain a value.
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB083] Invalid SourceCurrencyCode. Must contain a value
[F-LIB084] Invalid TargetCurrencyCode. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB085] Invalid SourceCurrencyBaseRate. Must not be negative or zero
[F-LIB086] Invalid SourceCurrencyBaseRate. Must have 4 decimals
[F-LIB087] Invalid TargetCurrencyBaseRate. Must not be negative or zero
[F-LIB088] Invalid TargetCurrencyBaseRate. Must have 4 decimals
[F-LIB089] Invalid CalculationRate. Must not be negative or zero
[F-LIB090] Invalid CalculationRate. Must have 4 decimals
[F-LIB310] Invalid MathematicOperatorCode. Must either be 'multiply' or 'divide'
[F-LIB239] Use either ContractTypeCode or ContractType
[F-LIB240] No more than one ContractDocumentReference class may be present

sch:assert.test: ./@mimeCode='image/tiff' or ./@mimeCode='image/png' or ./@mimeCode='image/jpeg' or ./@mimeCode='image/gif' or ./@mimeCode='application/pdf' or ./@mimeCode='text/xml' or ./@mimeCode='text/csv' or ./@mimeCode='application/vnd.ms-excel' or ./@mimeCode='application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet' or ./@mimeCode='application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet'

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB091] Attribute mimeCode must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB093] Use either Attachment or XPath
[F-LIB095] Use either EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject or ExternalReference
[F-LIB097] Invalid UUID. Must be of this form '6E09886B-DC6E-439F-82D1-7CCAC7F4E3B1'

sch:report.test: cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject and not(cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/tiff' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/png' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/jpeg' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/gif' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/pdf' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='text/xml' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='text/csv' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.ms-excel' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB098] Attribute mimeCode must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB279] When using ExternalReference, URI is mandatory
[F-LIB335] When DocumentTypeCode equals 'PersonalSecure', the ID must be either '1' or '2'.

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB099] There must be one PaymentMeans/ID that matches the PaymentMeansID under PaymentTerms

sch:assert.test: cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '1' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '10' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '20' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '31' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '42' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '48' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '49' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '50' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '58' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '59' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '93' or cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '97'

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB100] Invalid PaymentMeansCode. Must be a value from the codelist
sch:rule.sch:report: [W-LIB241] PaymentMeans/ID should be used when more than one instance of the PaymentMeans class is present.
[F-LIB105] Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:accounttypecode-1.1'
[W-LIB121] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '320'
[F-LIB136] Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:accounttypecode-1.1'
[W-LIB141] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '320'
[F-LIB103] PaymentMeansCode = 31, InstructionNote element not allowed
[F-LIB106] PaymentMeansCode = 31, Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:paymentchannelcode-1.1'
[F-LIB107] PaymentMeansCode = 31, ID element is mandatory
[F-LIB109] PaymentMeansCode = 31, PaymentChannelCode must equal IBAN or ZZZ
[F-LIB110] PaymentMeansCode = 31, PaymentNote must be no more than 20 characters
[F-LIB111] PaymentMeansCode = 31, PaymentNote must be no more than 20 characters
[F-LIB112] PaymentMeansCode = 31, AccountID must be no more than 8 characters
[F-LIB108] PaymentMeansCode = 31, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) element is not used, when PaymentChannelCode equals IBAN
[F-LIB113] PaymentMeansCode = 31, ID element is mandatory
[F-LIB114] PaymentMeansCode = 31, Account ID must be no more than 34 characters
[F-LIB115] PaymentMeansCode = 31, Account ID must must not be empty.
[F-LIB276] PaymentMeansCode = 31, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) element is mandatory, when PaymentChannelCode equals ZZZ
[F-LIB116] PaymentMeansCode = 31, FinancialInstitutionBranch/Name element is mandatory
[F-LIB117] PaymentMeansCode = 31, FinancialInstitutionBranch/Address class is mandatory
[F-LIB122] PaymentMeansCode = 42, CreditAccount class not allowed
[F-LIB119] PaymentMeansCode = 42, InstructionNote element not allowed
[F-LIB123] PaymentMeansCode = 42, Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:paymentchannelcode-1.1'
[F-LIB128] PaymentMeansCode = 42, PaymentChannelCode must equal DK:BANK
[F-LIB129] PaymentMeansCode = 42, PaymentNote must be no more than 20 characters
[F-LIB133] PaymentMeansCode = 42, PaymentNote must be no more than 20 characters
[F-LIB124] PaymentMeansCode = 42, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) element is mandatory
[F-LIB125] PaymentMeansCode = 42, PayeeFinancialAccount class is mandatory
[F-LIB126] PaymentMeansCode = 42, Account ID element is mandatory
[F-LIB127] PaymentMeansCode = 42, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) element is mandatory
[F-LIB130] PaymentMeansCode = 42, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) must be no more than 4 numerical characters
[F-LIB131] PaymentMeansCode = 42, Account ID must be no more than 10 characters
[F-LIB132] PaymentMeansCode = 42, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) must be no more than 4 numerical characters
[F-LIB311] FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) must contain a numerical value
[F-LIB365] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', PaymentChannelCode class must be excluded
[F-LIB366] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', InstructionID class must be excluded
[F-LIB367] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', InstructionNote class must be excluded
[F-LIB368] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', PayerFinancialAccount class must be excluded
[F-LIB369] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', PayeeFinancialAccount class must be excluded
[F-LIB370] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CreditAccount class must be excluded
[F-LIB342] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', the CardAccount class must be used
[F-LIB343] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/CardTypeCode class must be excluded
[F-LIB344] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/ValidityStartDate class must be excluded
[F-LIB345] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/ExpiryDate class must be excluded
[F-LIB346] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/IssuerID class must be excluded
[F-LIB347] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/IssueNumberID class must be excluded
[F-LIB348] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/CV2ID class must be excluded
[F-LIB349] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/CardChipCode class must be excluded
[F-LIB350] When PaymentMeansCode is '48', CardAccount/ChipApplicationID class must be excluded
[F-LIB135] PaymentMeansCode = 49, InstructionNote element not allowed
[F-LIB137] PaymentMeansCode = 49, CreditAccount class not allowed
[F-LIB134] PaymentMeansCode = 49, Use either PaymentChannelCode or InstructionID element
[F-LIB288] PaymentMeansCode = 49, PaymentNote must be no more than 20 characters

sch:report.test: (cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '49' and cbc:PaymentChannelCode) and not(cbc:PaymentChannelCode = 'IBAN' or cbc:PaymentChannelCode = 'DK:BANK')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB289] PaymentMeansCode = 49, If present, PaymentChannelCode must equal IBAN or DK:BANK
[F-LIB140] PaymentMeansCode = 49, InstructionID must be no more than 60 characters
[F-LIB290] PaymentMeansCode = 49, For DK:BANK, Account ID must be 10 characters
[F-LIB291] PaymentMeansCode = 49, For DK:BANK, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) must be 4 numerical characters
[F-LIB292] PaymentMeansCode = 49, For IBAN, Account ID must be no more than 34 characters
[F-LIB293] PaymentMeansCode = 49, For IBAN, Account ID must be at least 18 characters
[F-LIB294] PaymentMeansCode = 49, FinancialInstitutionBranch/ID (Registreringsnummer) element is not used, when PaymentChannelCode equals IBAN
[F-LIB295] PaymentMeansCode = 49, For IBAN, ID element is mandatory
[F-LIB142] PaymentMeansCode = 50, CreditAccount class not allowed
[F-LIB144] PaymentMeansCode = 50, PaymentID element is mandatory
[F-LIB319] PaymentMeansCode = 50, PayeeFinancialAccount class is mandatory.
[F-LIB320] PaymentMeansCode = 50, PayeeFinancialAccount.ID element is mandatory.
[F-LIB145] PaymentMeansCode = 50, InstructionID is mandatory when PaymentID equals 04 or 15
[F-LIB146] PaymentMeansCode = 50, PaymentChannelCode must equal DK:GIRO
[F-LIB143] PaymentMeansCode = 50, Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:paymentchannelcode-1.1'

sch:report.test: (cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '50') and not(cbc:PaymentID = '01' or cbc:PaymentID = '04' or cbc:PaymentID = '15')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB147] PaymentMeansCode = 50, PaymentID must equal 01, 04 or 15
[F-LIB148] PaymentMeansCode = 50, InstructionNote only allowed if PaymentID equals 01
[F-LIB149] PaymentMeansCode = 50, InstructionID must be no more than 16 characters
[F-LIB312] When PaymentMeansCode = 50 and PaymentID = '04' or '15', InstructionID must not be blank.
[F-LIB390] When PaymentMeansCode = 50 and PaymentID = '04' or '15', InstructionID must be numeric.
[F-LIB321] PaymentMeansCode = 50 or PaymentChannelCode = DK:GIRO, PayeeFinancialAccount.ID must consist of 7 or 8 numerical characters.
[F-LIB377] PaymentMeansCode = 58, PayeeFinancialAccount.ID must be used
[F-LIB379] PaymentMeansCode = 58, when PaymentChannelCode is used it must be 'IBAN'.
[F-LIB380] PaymentMeansCode = 59, when PaymentChannelCode is used it must be 'IBAN'.
[F-LIB152] PaymentMeansCode = 93, PaymentID element is mandatory
[F-LIB153] PaymentMeansCode = 93, InstructionID is mandatory when PaymentID equals 71 or 75
[F-LIB277] PaymentMeansCode = 93, PaymentChannelCode must equal DK:FIK
[F-LIB278] PaymentMeansCode = 93, Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:paymentchannelcode-1.1'

sch:report.test: (cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '93') and cbc:InstructionNote and not(cbc:PaymentID = '73' or cbc:PaymentID = '75')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB154] PaymentMeansCode = 93, InstructionNote only allowed if PaymentID equals 73 or 75

sch:report.test: (cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '93') and not(cbc:PaymentID = '71' or cbc:PaymentID = '73' or cbc:PaymentID = '75')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB155] PaymentMeansCode = 93, PaymentID must equal 71, 73 or 75
[F-LIB156] PaymentMeansCode = 93, InstructionID must be equal to 15 characters (when PaymentID equals 71)
[F-LIB157] PaymentMeansCode = 93, InstructionID must be equal to 16 characters (when PaymentID equals 75)

sch:report.test: (cbc:PaymentMeansCode = '93') and ((cbc:PaymentID = '71' or cbc:PaymentID = '75') and (not(exists(cbc:InstructionID)) or (matches(cbc:InstructionID, '[^\d]+'[.]))) or (cbc:InstructionID = ''))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB336] PaymentMeansCode = 93, InstructionID must be a numeric value when PaymentID equals 71 or 75.
[F-LIB275] PaymentMeansCode = 93, InstructionID only allowed if PaymentID equals 71 or 75
[F-LIB305] PaymentMeansCode = 93, AccountID must be 8 characters
[F-LIB158] PaymentMeansCode = 97, PaymentChannelCode element only allowed with value = "DK:NEMKONTO"
[F-LIB159] PaymentMeansCode = 97, InstructionID element not allowed
[F-LIB160] PaymentMeansCode = 97, InstructionNote element not allowed
[F-LIB161] PaymentMeansCode = 97, PaymentID element not allowed
[F-LIB163] PaymentMeansCode = 97, PayerFinancialAccount class not allowed
[F-LIB164] PaymentMeansCode = 97, PayeeFinancialAccount class not allowed
[F-LIB165] PaymentMeansCode = 97, CreditAccount class not allowed
[W-LIB245]: ID should be used when more than one instance of the PaymentTerms class is present
[F-LIB246] when ID equals 'Factoring', Note element is mandatory (factoring note)
[F-LIB247] No more than one Note element may be present
[F-LIB169] Use either Attachment or XPath
[F-LIB171] Use either EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject or ExternalReference
[F-LIB173] Invalid UUID. Must be of this form '6E09886B-DC6E-439F-82D1-7CCAC7F4E3B1'

sch:report.test: cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject and not(cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/tiff' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/png' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/jpeg' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/gif' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/pdf' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='text/xml' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='text/csv' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.ms-excel' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet' or cac:Attachment/cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB174] Attribute mimeCode must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB096] When using ExternalReference, URI is mandatory

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB177] Invalid ItemIdentification/ID. Must contain a value.
[F-LIB283] Invalid ItemIdentification/ID. Must contain a value.

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB179] Invalid schemeID: ''. Must be a value from the codelist: ''
[F-LIB180] schemeID = DK:CVR, EndpointID must be a valid CVR number (like 'DK12345678', value found: '')
[F-LIB181] schemeID = GLN, EndpointID must be a valid GLN number (like '1234567890123', value found: '')
[F-LIB216] schemeID = EAN, EndpointID must be a valid EAN number (like '1234567890123', value found: '')
[F-LIB185] schemeID = GLN, ID must be a valid GLN number (like '1234567890123', value found: '')
[F-LIB218] schemeID = EAN, ID must be a valid EAN number (like '1234567890123', value found: '')
[F-LIB287] schemeID = DK:P, ID must be a valid P number (like '1234567890', value found: '')

sch:pattern.sch:rule:
[F-LIB186] CorporateRegistrationScheme class must be excluded
[F-LIB187] Invalid CompanyID. Must contain a value
[F-LIB189] Invalid schemeID. Must be a valid scheme for PartyLegalEntity/CompanyID
[F-LIB190] schemeID = DK:CVR, CompanyID must be a valid CVR number (like 'DK12345678', value found: '')
[F-LIB191] schemeID = DK:CPR, CompanyID must be a valid CPR number (like '1234560000', value found: '') -->

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB193] Invalid CompanyID. Must contain a value
[F-LIB195] Invalid schemeID. Must be a valid scheme for PartyTaxScheme/CompanyID
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB196] schemeID = DK:SE, CompanyID must be a valid SE number (like 'DK12345678', value found: '')

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB226] One TaxCategory class must be present
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB248] When MultiplierFactorNumeric is used, BaseAmount is mandatory
[F-LIB227] MultiplierFactorNumeric must be a positive number
[F-LIB228] Amount must equal BaseAmount * MultiplierFactorNumeric
[F-LIB271] MultiplierFactorNumeric must be a positive number
[F-LIB270] When MultiplierFactorNumeric is used, BaseAmount is mandatory
[F-LIB228] Amount must equal BaseAmount * MultiplierFactorNumeric
[F-LIB314] Using the same TaxScheme ID in two different TaxTotal classes are not allowed.
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB306] Exactly one TaxTotal class must contain VAT (Moms)
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB250] Invalid TaxAmount. Must have 2 decimals
[F-LIB251] Invalid RoundingAmount. Must not be zero
[F-LIB252] Invalid RoundingAmount. Must have 2 decimals
[F-LIB253] Can only be false if proforma invoice (InvoiceTypeCode = '325')
[F-LIB373] TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount only valid when TaxCategory/ID = 'StandardRated'
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-LIB385] TaxAmount of '' must equal the sum of all followiung TaxSubtotal/TaxableAmount ''
[F-LIB259] Invalid TaxableAmount. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB315] Specifying the same TaxSubtotal.TaxCategory.ID in one TaxTotal class is not allowed
[F-LIB316] Specifying different TaxScheme.ID in same TaxTotal class is not allowed.
[F-LIB261] Invalid TaxableAmount. Must have 2 decimals
[F-LIB263] Invalid TaxAmount. Must have 2 decimals
[F-LIB264] Invalid CalculationSequenceNumeric. Must not be negative or zero

sch:report.test: cbc:TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount and (number(cbc:TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount) != 0) and (cac:TaxCategory/cbc:ID = 'StandardRated') and ( ((number(cbc:TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount) < 0) and (number(../cbc:TaxAmount) > 0)) or ((number(cbc:TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount) > 0) and (number(../cbc:TaxAmount) < 0)) )

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB266] Invalid TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount. Must be negative if TaxTotal/TaxAmount is negative, and must be be positive if TaxTotal/TaxAmount is positive
[F-LIB267] Invalid TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount. Must have 2 decimals

sch:report.test: cac:TaxCategory/cbc:ID = 'StandardRated' and xs:decimal(cbc:TaxableAmount) > 0 and xs:decimal(cbc:TaxAmount) = 0 and xs:decimal($CalculatedVat) >= 0.005

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB381] Invalid VAT TaxAmount - When TaxCategory/ID are 'StandardRated' and TaxableAmount > 0 () TaxAmount can't be '()' unless calculated vat '()' are less then 0.005
[F-LIB373] TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount only valid when TaxCategory/ID = 'StandardRated'
[F-LIB333] When TaxCategory/TaxScheme/Id is VAT, the TaxCategory/Percent must be present.
[F-LIB334] The TaxCategory/Percent must contain a decimal value with maximum 2 decimals.
[F-LIB373] TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount only valid when TaxCategory/ID = 'StandardRated'
[F-LIB284] Use either EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject or ExternalReference

sch:report.test: cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject and not(cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/tiff' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/png' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/jpeg' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='image/gif' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/pdf' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='text/xml' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='text/csv' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.ms-excel' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet' or cbc:EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject/@mimeCode='application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet')

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-LIB285] Attribute mimeCode must be a value from the codelist
[F-LIB286] When using ExternalReference, URI is mandatory
